title: Ticket #3720: Memory leak in gridmanager when issuing EC2 commands to gahp
description: When unmarshaling results for many EC2 GAHP commands, unnecessary strdup()s are done, leaking memory. This code has been present for a long time, but was discovered during work for #3681.
remarks:
2013-Jul-08 16:31:42 by tlmiller:
CODE REVIEW

Looks good (StringList::append() does the strdup() for us).
